German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Middle High German vriundinne, from Old High German friuntinna. Analyzable as Freund +‎ -in.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈfʁɔʏ̯ndɪn/
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Freundin f (genitive Freundin, plural Freundinnen, male Freund)

  1. female friend
  2. girlfriend

Usage notes[edit]

  • Freundin (and Freund) may refer to either a platonic friend or a romantic partner. See Freund for more.

Declension[edit]
